item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) HIGH-QUALITY PRECISION BITS: Come with 25 precision bits and 10 mainstream types, which can meet daily maintenance needs. All screwdriver bits are made of S2 steel with a hardness of up to 60HRC. Compare with CR-V, S2 steel has the advantages of high strength, wear resistance, and corrosion resistance. Every ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $69.99 - $59.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:23:38 UTC – Details)



HIGH-QUALITY PRECISION BITS: Come with 25 precision bits and 10 mainstream types, which can meet daily maintenance needs. All screwdriver bits are made of S2 steel with a hardness of up to 60HRC. Compare with CR-V, S2 steel has the advantages of high strength, wear resistance, and corrosion resistance. Every bit is machined with high precision to avoid damaging the screw. Specially used for precision object disassembly, such as repairing computers/tablets/game consoles/cameras/watches, etc.
ADVANCED APPEARANCE: Extremely textured aluminum alloy frosted appearance, bringing you a delicate touch. Electric screwdriver dark gray appearance design brings advanced visual experience. Aluminum shell surface treated with anodic oxidization, anti-sweat, and anti-corrosion. PC+ABS high-strength engineering plastic shell bottom, sturdy and durable. Stylish, high-end precision screwdriver set is the perfect gift.
BUILT-IN MAGNETIZER MAGNETIZATION ANY TIME: The storage box has an integrated magnetization area design, which can be magnetized at any time for the equipped bits and any screwdrivers to better absorb precision screws. The practical magnetic design aims to save time and effort. Small torque setting keeps you from over-tightening screws. HOTO useful precision screwdriver set is a decent gift for both professional and amateur.
EASY USE & PORTABLE MAGNETIC BOX: HOTO electric screwdriver with all-aluminum alloy non-slip shell, surface three-dimensional texture design, make the grip more stable and less slippery. The front end of the screwdriver has a built-in magnet, and the batch head is magnetically installed for quick replacement. One-button start design, easy to use, even users with zero experience can easily operate. TPU soft rubber material buttons, provide a comfortable feel.
TYPE-C & PORTABLE BOX: Type-C charging port, suitable for charging cables of various electronic products, enabling charging anytime, anywhere. Comes with a storage box, lightweight and compact design makes it easy to put in a bag and carry outdoors. The magnetic design makes it much easier to use and prevents the loss of the bit. Precision screwdriver built-in 350mAh lithium battery with long battery life. The battery can punch 500 screws once fully charged.

4.5
Price: $69.99 - $59.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:23:38 UTC – Details)

Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Please review the warranty carefully, and contact the manufacturer if you have any questions.

Price: $46.07 - $29.97
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:38:30 UTC – Details)


The 7-in-1 Impact Flip Socket features three interchangeable sockets store on the driver shaft to avoid any loose pieces that can get lost. The tool is impact rated for use with any impact driver. A powerful Rare-Earth magnet allows the sockets to hold onto any fasteners. Sockets are color coded for easy identification. For more than 160 years, Klein Tools has manufactured premium-quality, professional-grade hand tools that deliver the performance, durability and precision needed to get the job done right. Our family of engineers, workers and craftsman continue to put six generations of expertise into every tool we create by using only the highest quality materials, superior workmanship, and keeping manufacturing as close to home as we can. Klein isn’t just the name of our company, it’s also our family name. And since we’re an American company that’s family-owned and family-run, you know you can count on us to be here tomorrow. Klein Tools doesn’t just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day … Since 1857.
6 INTEGRATED HEX SIZES plus 1/4-Inch deep bit holding feature
IMPACT RATED SHAFT AND SOCKETS can also be used with an impact driver
HEX DRIVER SIZES include 1/4-Inch, 5/16-Inch, 11/32-Inch, 3/8-Inch, 7/16-Inch and 1/2-Inch
MULTI-FUNCTION 1/4-Inch SOCKET has both shallow (driver) and deep (bit holder) positions
FLIP SOCKETS store on shaft in any order or orientation
POWERFUL RARE-EARTH MAGNET securely holds bits and hex head fasteners
DETACHABLE SOCKETS allow for easy removal of metal shavings from magnet

Read more

About Klein Tools

As an American manufacturer of hand tools for more than 160 years, Klein Tools makes premium-quality, professional-grade tools that deliver performance, durability and precision. Our team continues to put six generations of expertise into each tool by using the highest quality materials and superior workmanship.

Klein Tools doesn’t just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day … Since 1857.

Impact Driver, 7-in-1 Impact Flip Socket Set with Handle, 6 Hex Driver Sizes plus a 1/4-Inch Bit Holder

The 7-in-1 Impact Flip Socket features six hex driver sizes plus a bit holding feature to easily switch between sizes. Three interchangeable sockets store on the driver shaft to avoid any loose pieces that can get lost. The tool is impact rated for use with any impact driver.

  • 7-in-1 Impact Flip Socket Set includes six integrated hex sizes plus a 1/4-Inch bit holding feature
  • Quickly and easily change blade between a screwdriver handle and an impact driver
  • Includes 1/4-Inch, 5/16-Inch, 11/32-Inch, 3/8-Inch, 7/16-Inch and 1/2-Inch nut driver sizes
  • Multi-function 1/4-Inch socket has both shallow (driver) and deep (bit holder) configurations for added versatility
  • Powerful Rare-Earth Magnet securely holds bits and hex head fasteners
  • Features 1/4-Inch Quick-Connect adapter for easy use with an impact driver
  • Sockets are color coded for easy identification
  • Detachable sockets allow for easy removal of metal shavings from magnet

Read more

FEATURES

Includes 6 integrated hex sizes plus 1/4-Inch bit holder

Quickly change between a screwdriver handle and an impact driver

Store sockets on shaft in any orientation or order

Read more

From the brand

New Arrivals

Pink Tool Set

Drills & Pliers

Screwdrivers & tool bags

Longer Lasting Power: the pink drill set is powered by a powerful 12-Volt, 1.5 AH Lithium-ion battery for enough power for a full range of applications.
Compact and Lightweight Design: the pink drill driver allows users to carry out drilling/driving tasks in confined spaces and offers users greater comfort and efficiency on the job site.
Multiple Purposes: the pink power drill features a 3/8 in. keyless chuck with a 19-position clutch adjusts torque output to control the depth of the screw or fastener. The drill is designed with variable 2-speed settings (0-400 rpm and 0-1500 rpm) for multiple purposes.
Notice：This is a carbon brushes drill. It is normal that the brushes produce sparks from the electromagnetic charge which are clearly visible inside the drill.
The pink drill set for women is perfect for your home use or gifts.

12V Cordless Drill Set includes:

(1) 12V Cordless Drill Driver;

(1) 12V 1.5AH Lithium-Ion Battery;

(10) HSS6542 drill bits:1/16, 5/64, 3/32, 7/64, 1/8, 9/64, 5/32, 11/64, 3/16, 1/4;

(20) Screwdriver bits: Slotted 1/8”, 5/32”, 3/16”, 7/32”, 1/4”, 9/32”, POZI: PZ0, PZ1, PZ2, PZ3; Philips: PH0, PH1 X 2, PH2 X 5, PH3 X 2;

(10) Nut drivers: 5/32, 3/16, 7/32, 1/4, 9/32, 5/16, 11/32, 3/8, 7/16, 15/32;

(1) 60mm magnetic extension bar;

(1) Battery Charger;

(1) Tool bag;

FASTPRO 12V Pink Drill Driver

FASTPRO 12V Lithium-ion Cordless Pink Drill Driver Set powered by a powerful 12-Volt, 1.5 AH Lithium-ion battery for enough power for a full range of applications. The power drill features a 3/8 in. keyless chuck with a 19-position clutch adjusts torque output to control the depth of the screw or fastener. The drill is designed with variable 2-speed settings (0-400 rpm and 0-1500 rpm) for multiple purposes. The compact and lightweight design allows users to carry out drilling/driving tasks in confined spaces and offers users greater comfort and efficiency on the job site. Its built-in LED light to illuminate work surfaces and allows users to quickly change attachments for any project need.

3/8 keyless chuck with 10pc drill bits, 10pc nut drivers & 20pc screwdriver bits for your work and DIY projects，included the wood or furniture assembling, metal drill and screws driving.

【COMPACT PORTABLE TOOL BAG】Small size carries wealth of tools, easy to carry. Made of Oxford cloth, resist to wear and tear. Extended hand strap design, easy to carry and store. From the brand

Rookie Driver Car Magnets

Student Driver Car Magnet

We are committed to researching magnetic student driving signs, decals and stickers. Our mission is to ensure that every driver has a more enjoyable and comfortable driving experience, to allow other drivers to tolerate you with more space and respect, to reduce the nervousness of new drivers while preventing the possibility of accidents.

Christmas Gifts

A great gift for your family, friends, colleagues and neighbours in the run up to Christmas!

➽STRONGEST MAGNETS: The student driver car magnet is made of 0.7mm thick strong magnet. Compared with other magnets, it is thicker, stronger, more durable and be patient student driver magnet can be more firmly attached to the surface of the car, we have tested for a long time at high speed, heavy rain and snow and never fall off. Tip: Magnets can only be attached to metal surfaces, not to plastic or aluminum parts.
➽HIGHLY REFLECTIVITY: New driver magnet for car is made of high quality waterproof and heat resistant materials through strong magnetic and highly reflective materials to maximize the amount of light reflected from the sign, attracting people’s attention and ensuring that the rookie driver car magnet is clearly visible even at night, in fog and rain, and other drivers can notice you from the side and back of the car. An excellent tool for teens with no driving experience.
➽Unique design: New driver sticker signs will be displayed humorously and can make others aware that you are learning to drive, then they will be tolerant of providing you with more space and respect and reduce the possibility of annoying honking while controlling the speed of their car to prevent an accident. Student driver magnet also can reduce the level of nervousness teen driver feel when driving.
➽Removable and Reusable: Student driver signs for car removable, easily removable or transferable thanks to the magnetized backing. All driver magnets can be removed and reattached anytime. You can easily transfer it to another car when it is needed. Perfect as a gift for your family, colleagues, friends during various holidays, parties, birthdays
➽100% Satisfaction Guarantee: We are dedicated to providing the best quality new driver sticker for car to our customers. If you are in any way dissatisfied with our please be patient student driver magnet, please contact us and we will do our best to provide you a satisfactory reply.

▲Package Included:
1 x (1/4 * 1/4 * 65mm length — 1/4 ” shank can be converted to 6.35mm square head)Socket Adapter
1 x (3/8 * 1/4 * 65mm length — 1/4 ” shank can be converted to 9mm square head)Socket Adapter
1 x (1/2 * 1/4 * 72mm length — 1/4 ” shank can be converted to 13mm square head)Socket Adapter
1 x 105 Degree Right Angle Drill
▲Key Features: 
1. Adapts sockets to power drills and drivers
2. Detent ball for secure socket retention so sockets snap on tightly and won’t slip off
3. 1/4-inch hex shank prevents stripping during high speed drill operation
4. Super strong heat-treated chrome vanadium steel for normal and impact use
5. Sandblasted finish
6. Converts all power drills into speedy socket drivers
7. Use with a hand screwdriver handle or battery/power tool
8. Color coded for easy recognition 
▲Specification:
● Material: stainless steel
● Color: silver(as pictures shown)
● Size: approx. 5.9 x 3cm
● Model: 1/4″ (6.35mm)
● Fits: 1/4″ 6.35mm hex drill bit screwdriver
Features:
● 105°designs for tight spaces, extends the power of a cordless screwdriver, max torque: 10n/m.
● 1/4 inch hex drive shaft is quick change compatible and fits most power drill and driver chucks.
● 105 Degree Right Angle Driver Drilling and Driving Power Screwdriver Drill Attachment with 1/4-inch Hex Quick Change Drive and Magnetic Bit Socket
● Easy & fast, connect to the standard hex screwdrier.
● Can be connected to drill, rechargeable drill or manual wrench.
● Easy, Lightweight, fast, connect to the standard hex screwdrier.
● The gears are mounted in a die cast with 3 durable ball bearings.
● Magnetic 1/4 inch hex socket accepts and holds standard drill and driver bits.
● Perfect handy tool for hard-to-reach areas.Connect hand drill and manual wrench.
【Colorful】：Easy to Choose: Different colour coded rings, clear help quickly pick the right one. Our products belong to the latest upgrades, quality is super good.Christmas Gift for Dad/Father,Husband, Boyfriend, Men,DIY.
CR-V and black phosphate finish. Forged with heat treated chrome vanadium steel for superior strength, each adapter with corrosion-resistant black phosphate finish for against rust and corrosion. Detent ball on adapters provides a secure fit into the socket,reduces wear and prevents rounding off at corners,ensuring does not wobble while working.
【Multifunction-3Pcs】Used in the installation of pneumatic screwdriver, electric screwdriver, pneumatic drill, manual screwdriver and other installation for the hexagonal tool .It is a good accessory for conversion. for Universal Socket,Impact Adapter and Reducer Set,Universal Joint Set,Socket Adapter and Drive Reducer Set,Drive Impact Socket Extension Bar Set,Drive Impact Socket Set.
【Purpose-3Pcs】: This adapter set is designed to provide a securely locked in extension to your existing tool. Provides additional length to reach into a multitude of hard to reach spaces. The spring ball lock ensures a tight fit into the driver head to prevent slipping during use. Specifically machined to fit securely into a hand held driver, drill driver or impact wrench.
【Wide application-105°Right Angle Drill Driver】Can be connected to the drill, rechargeable drill or manual wrench, extending their reach to inaccessible stenosis , twisting screws, nut and more【Features】105° designs for tight spaces, extends the power of a cordless screwdriver – 100 in/lbs. torque, 400 RPM.These Tools are Work Great for Light Drilling,Slow Speed/Screw Driving,Like Cordless Drill,Ratchet Hand Screwdriver,etc.

Product Description

This is the most cost-effective product in the DIY class after many R&D and design configurations.

It is a wonderful companion for manual work.

This set of products includes everything you need. It is a must in your home garage. Standard and precision screwdrivers used to handle various sizes of work, it can effectively help you complete large and small tasks.Whether you are a mechanic or a DIY enthusiast, this set of products can accompany you for a long time and is a very practical and cost-effective partner. At the same time, it is also a great gift-giving option. Give it to husband, father, teacher, brother, and of course to female mechanics, including any DIY enthusiast. Anyone who receives this product will have nothing but praise.

21-PIECE MAGNETIC SCREWDRIVERS

SLOTTED screwdriver: SL3 x 3″, SL4 x 3″, SL5 x 4″, SL6 x 4″, SL6 x 5″, SL6 x 6″, SL8 x 6″PHILLIPS screwdriver: PH0 x 3″, PH1 x 3″, PH2 x 4″, PH2 x 5″, PH2 x 6″, PH3 x 6″TORX screwdriver: T15 x 3″, T20 x 3″, T25 x 4″, T30 x 4″SQUARE screwdriver: S0 x 3″, S1 x 3″, S2 x 4″POZI screwdriver: PZ0 x 3″

4-PIECE PICK & HOOKS

90-degree hook

Straight hook

Full hook

8-PIECE PRECISION SCREWDRIVERS

SLOTTED: SL2.5 x 50mm, SL3.0 x 50mmPHILLIPS: PH00 x 50mm, PH0 x 50mmTORX: T6 x 50mm, T7 x 50mm, T8 x 50mm, T10 x 50mm

16-PIECE Metric and SAE HEX KEY

60-PIECE SCREWDRIVERS BITS & 1PC RATCHET DRIVER HANDLE
